typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RCID as string ('1,2'),
	SQNR as string ('3,8'),
	TDNR as string ('11,15'),
	CDGT as string ('26,1'),
	TCNR as string ('27,15'),
	TCND as string ('42,1'),
	TRNC as string ('43,4')
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FixedTCN1
FixedTCN1 derive(RCID = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($RCID,',')[1]),toInteger(split($RCID,',')[2])),
		SQNR = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($SQNR,',')[1]),toInteger(split($SQNR,',')[2])),
		TDNR = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TDNR,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TDNR,',')[2])),
		CDGT = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($CDGT,',')[1]),toInteger(split($CDGT,',')[2])),
		TCNR = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TCNR,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TCNR,',')[2])),
		TCND = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TCND,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TCND,',')[2]))) ~> MapFields1
MapFields1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TCN1CSV
